glsa.title: Chromium: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Chromium, the worst of which can allow remote attackers to cause Denial of Service.

background.p: Chromium is an open-source web browser project.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Chromium. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to cause a Denial of Service condition or possibly have other unspecified impact by leveraging improper handling of render-tree inconsistencies.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Chromium users should upgrade to the latest version:
